name: Colour Matching Ring
description:
where you must touch on screen for jump the ring and match the color of ring and pillar. This is knock out circle simulation game you have only on chance to prove your cleverness and switch to make record in color ring world.

You must focus and follow the ring & pillar color pattern on each obstacle otherwise game will be over!

The game is very simple and challenging on the beautiful surface- tap the screen to keep a ring bouncing in the air and match its color with obstacle pillars.

In order to hit the ring on pillar the difficulty level will be increase as well as your scores will be increase. Pass through as many pillar and arrow obstacles as you can before crashing into a different color than your ring ball. The challenge of the 3D Color Ring Jump Simulator game is that the obstacles pillars are moving fast and you quickly drop the ball on same color.

Over time and score, the obstacles become more fast speed and complex, different shapes of circle and obstacles and areas of color matching.
Play be careful and not to put the ring on wrong color, the game will be over or you’ll have to start again.


Color Matching Ring Simulator: 3d

Colorful rings and puzzle pillars
Endless scoring game
Very interesting and challenging puzzle game
Easy to play but hard to master
Infinite levels and number of obstacles
Simple, easy and addictive gameplay
High resolution graphics and different animations
Be careful and not to drop ring on different color
